value.title: World's fastest supercomputer and AI tapped to predict tsunami flooding
value.excerpt: Fujitsu's supercomputer Fugaku is powering AI capabilities that could help predict coastal flooding conditions. "Ordinary PCs" can run the Fugaku-trained AI model, according to the company.

value.title: Samsung creates RAM with integrated AI processing hardware

value.title: World’s fastest computer gives birth to tsunami-predicting AI
value.excerpt: The Fugaku supercomputer was used to develop an AI model that predicts tsunami flooding in almost real-time on a regular PC.

value.title: Deep learning may help doctors choose better lung cancer treatments
